reviews.review_msg: Expects a lot of engaged discussion in class.  Don't go if you haven't done the readings, but makes for a more interesting class if you have.  Fair marker, makes very clear her expectations, and is very helpful if you have questions.  She only comes across condescending if you have not done the required work.

She was rude and condescending, she didn't want to teach but expected us to know everything already. She made us sit in circles and treated us like were stupid preschoolers. Def did not like this class or her. Do not recommend

She had a high level of interest in the topics and the course was very well structured. Her lecture style involved a lot of small group work that would transition into full class discussions/debates. She expected everyone to be prepared for class and to read all the readings beforehand. I would definitely take another course with this prof.

Thanks for ruining the two classes I was really looking forward to.POL321&322 haven't been offered for a while so when the department was offering them I was excited.First day of class, she had this condescending approach like we're in elementary school.Group intro to get us to sit in circles and complained how Japanese schoolkids do better than us
